import { Meta } from '@storybook/blocks'
import { font, spacing, zIndex } from '../_components/tokenRows'
import { Tip } from '../_components/Tip'

<Meta title="Theme/Base Tokens" />

# Base Tokens

Base tokens contain values that remain consistent across all themes.

## Font

<Tip>
  The value of these tokens are valid CSS-in-JS objects, and can be spread
  within any css prop.
</Tip>

### Display

<table className="wds-token-table">
  <colgroup>
    <col width="120px" />
    <col width="100%" />
    <col width="100%" />
    <col width="100%" />
  </colgroup>
  <thead>{font.headings}</thead>
  <tbody>{Object.keys(font.rows.display).map(size => Object.values(font.rows.display[size]))}</tbody>
</table>

### Heading

<table className="wds-token-table">
  <colgroup>
    <col width="120px" />
    <col width="100%" />
    <col width="100%" />
    <col width="100%" />
  </colgroup>
  <thead>{font.headings}</thead>
  <tbody>{Object.values(font.rows.heading)}</tbody>
</table>

### Body

<table className="wds-token-table">
  <colgroup>
    <col width="120px" />
    <col width="100%" />
    <col width="100%" />
    <col width="100%" />
  </colgroup>
  <thead>{font.headings}</thead>
  <tbody>{Object.keys(font.rows.body).map(size => Object.values(font.rows.body[size]))}</tbody>
</table>

## Spacing

<table className="wds-token-table">
  <colgroup>
    <col width="120px" />
    <col width="100%" />
    <col width="100%" />
  </colgroup>
  <thead>{spacing.headings}</thead>

<table className="wds-token-table">

    <col width="100%" />
    <col width="100%" />
  </colgroup>
  <thead>{zIndex.headings}</thead>
